lead_paragraph: Striker Wayne Rooney will return to England's starting line-up as captain for Friday's World Cup qualifier against Scotland as his experience in the tense encounter will be vital for the young squad, interim manager Gareth Southgate said.

headline.print_headline: Rooney Returns to Captain England in Scotland Clash
headline.main: Rooney Returns to Captain England in Scotland Clash

snippet: Striker Wayne Rooney will return to England's starting line-up as captain for Friday's World Cup qualifier against Scotland as his experience in the tense encounter will be vital for the young squad, interim manager Gareth Southgate said....
